title: Santa Girls
description: Ho-ho-how are Mary-Kate and Ashley supposed to earn enough money to buy everyone Christmas presents this year? By working as Santa's Helpers at the mall! The girls think it will be tons of fun. But five children crying, four parents yelling, three missing paychecks, two stolen presents and one big accident at work leave Mary-Kate and Ashley needing a Christmas miracle to get through the season this year!
author: Diana G. Gallagher
